prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered nurturing pose with arms open in welcoming embrace, chibi proportions with large translucent shifting structured head with unique vesica_piscis structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating vesica_piscis, fibonacci_spiral, wave_interference patterns, styled with Dominion guides influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by lunar and neutral grey inspired by wisdom fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns fused with vision-seeking tunics and Crystal gazer robes with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, incorporating Translucent vision silk, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and vesica_piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with scrying mirror with Sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor DOXMAEL's profile: 'He who establishes the night', Aethyr TEX, Water element, Tarot The Empress, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Taurus, embodying the essence: 'In DOXMAEL's presence, boundaries between worlds grow thin a liminal magic threads through the air, weaving together realities in secret hermetic harmony.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent shifting structured head with unique vesica_piscis structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating vesica_piscis, fibonacci_spiral, wave_interference patterns, styled with Dominion guides influences

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns fused with vision-seeking tunics and Crystal gazer robes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, incorporating Translucent vision silk
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with scrying mirror
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who establishes the night'
profile_data.essence: In DOXMAEL's presence, boundaries between worlds grow thin a liminal magic threads through the air, weaving together realities in secret hermetic harmony.
profile_data.angelic_role: Dominion of Veil of Night; guides pearl-plumed wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent, ever-shifting form that emerges from water's depths, simultaneously liquid and structured, embodying the liminal boundary between manifest and potential states
profile_data.color_reasoning: Pearl represents lunar wisdom and hidden depths of Netzach, while indigo connects to Water element and intuitive vision of TEX Aethyr
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing transformation, emergence, and interconnected dimensional boundaries
